title: What's the difference between Hillsong Worship and Hillsong United? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hillsong Worship (formerly known as Hillsong LIVE) and Hillsong United (also known as UNITED) are part of Hillsong Church’s music ministry called Hillsong Music. The main difference between Hillsong Worship and UNITED are their missions. The mission of Hillsong Worship is to build the local church and local churches across the world through passionate and genuine worship. Hillsong Worship’s focus is to make sure they’re doing their part in resourcing to local church worship teams. On the other hand, UNITED’s mission is to write songs that “awaken churches and individuals to the fact that we are redeemed and called into the story of God.” Unlike Hillsong Worship, UNITED focuses on reaching individuals inside and outside the church through their unique musical sound. Although Hillsong Worship and UNITED’s missions are different, they still follow the same vision of Hillsong Church which is “to reach and influence the world by building a large Christ-centered, Bible-based church, changing mindsets and empowering people to lead and impact in every sphere of life.” Also, since Hillsong Church is so huge, they need a lot of volunteers to help with their different ministries and church services. Taya is among one of the many worship leaders at Hillsong who helps sing and lead worship at the church. She is most recognized than Hillsong’s other worship leaders because she is one of UNITED’s core songwriters and singers. For more information, check out Hillsong’s website: Hillsong Music - UNITED, Young & Free and Hillsong Worship
